com.psddev.dari.util
Class AbstractStorageItem

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.util.AbstractStorageItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
SettingsBackedObject, StorageItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmazonStorageItem, BrightcoveStorageItem, CloudStorageItem, LocalStorageItem, UrlStorageItem
public abstract class AbstractStorageItem
extends Object
implements StorageItem

Skeletal implementation of a storage item. Subclasses should further implement the following:

  • createData()
  • saveData(java.io.InputStream)
